{{Lang|'''Changhu'''|zh=昌虎|zh_rm=Chānghǔ}} is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. He can be found at [[Heyu Tea House]] during the day (until 19:00), conversing with his master [[Gentry Maocai]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Changhu & Gentry Maocai.png|Changhu's location ''(Daytime)''
NPC Location Tea Master Liu Su Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Changhu serves [[Gentry Maocai]] and, under orders of his boss, attempts to extort [[Chang the Ninth]]'s [[Cor Lapis]] supply during {{Quest|Bookworm Swordsman}}.

===Appearance===
Changhu is a muscular man clad in loose brown pants, a beige tee, and a light brown vest on top. He wears bandage appendages on both his wrists and ankles, with light brown cuffs and dark brown shoes. His hair is black and short, with a V-shaped hairline and hazel eyes.
